Key Match Events: LeBron James scored 38 points, Max Christie had a career-high 28, and the Lakers overcame Anthony Davis' absence for a 114-106 victory over the Portland Trail Blazers
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jaxson Hayes had four points while starting in Davisâ€™ spot in his return from a 15-game injury absence
Dorian Finney-Smith scored three points and Shake Milton had four in the veterans' second game for the Lakers since arriving in a trade with Brooklyn
Others: The Lakers have won six of eight
Anfernee Simons scored 11 of his 23 points in the fourth quarter for the Blazers
Shaedon Sharpe and Deni Avdija added 19 points apiece for the Blazers
Austin Reaves contributed 15 points, 11 assists and eight rebounds as Los Angeles hung on to beat Portland for the fifth straight time
